articles.title: Remembering lyricist Yogesh Gaur: Ten best songs by the veteran writer - The Indian Express
articles.description: Late lyricist Yogesh Gaur gave Hindi cinema some memorable songs in films like Anand (1971), Mili (1975), Rajnigandha (1974), Chhoti Si Baat (1976), Baton Baton Mein (1979), Manzil (1979) and many others.
articles.content:
Written by Arushi Jain
 | New Delhi | 
Updated: May 30, 2020 1:47:19 pm
